title: Permit Name Registry Schema
description: This data specification enables the creation of a standard list of permit names for the Natural Resource Sector permitting systems.

permit-name-id.description: A unique key of registered permit names.

source_system_acronym.description: Acronym for the source system providing the permit tracking.

permit_name.description: The business domain permit name type

permit_application_type.description: The form type for a permit or licence application
